title: Warriors clap back, Nets’ have a Kyrie issue
description:
Andrew Wiggins and Jordan Poole are looking for that next contract. Both are looking to secure the bag, but will it be with the Golden State Warriors? Jalen & Jacoby discuss the chances that they will both be on the team next year. Draymond is on twitter clapping back at all the haters. Ja Morant isn’t afraid to clap back setting up a showdown between these top two teams next year. Find out if Ja has what it takes to take down the champs next year. Also, trouble in Brooklyn as Kyrie has contract issues. Will he sign long term or might we see Kyrie on the Lakers next year? Find out that and more…
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Jalen Rose, David Jacoby
